column14: So moisturizing and I love the fact it does not transfer ever!  You will never need any other lipstick. I have the clear one Je Ne Sais Quoi which goes on clear and then changes to your perfect color AMAZING and now this Rose Flush.  Best lipsticks ever!!  Moisture and no transfer of color ever! Ordered by my wife.  She is obsessed by these lipsticks and highly recommends to her friends.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2021
column14: It’s not a stain; wipes off after 1 minute or 20 minutes. It’s not moisturizing and it accentuates dry, flaky lips. Isnt smoothing; settles into lines like it melted there.
